DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study examine effect Incredible Years Baby Programme ( IY baby ) offer universal intervention compare Usual Care ( UC ) parent infant age 0-12 month .
DOC.brief_title: The Incredible Years Parents Babies Program Denmark
DOC.detailed_description: A randomise controlled effectiveness pilot trial Incredible Years Parents Babies Program ( IY baby ) offer universal intervention two municipality Denmark . 120 family randomise IY Baby ( intervention ) og Usual Care ( UC- control ) . Families recruit study infant age 0-4 month old . All first time mother one municipality mother another municipality recruit . Outcomes measure 20 week post baseline child 18 month old . The aim trial estimate effectiveness IY Baby program parent infant well-being , development relationship establish parameter definitive trial . In addition , pilot study also gather information parent recruitment participation inform future research area .
DOC.criteria: Parents child age 04 month Parents able understand Danish basic level Serious physical disability serious mental disability Child place home care
